code: import"core-js/modules/es.regexp.to-string.js";import"core-js/modules/es.string.replace.js";import"core-js/modules/es.string.starts-with.js";export function format(formatSpecifier){for(var _len=arguments.length,parameters=new Array(_len>1?_len-1:0),_key=1;_key<_len;_key++){parameters[_key-1]=arguments[_key];}if(!formatSpecifier){return'';}return formatSpecifier.replace(/{(\d+)}/g,(match,index)=>{if(index>=parameters.length){return match;}const value=parameters[index];if(typeof value!=='number'&&!value){return'';}if(typeof value==='string'){return value;}return value.toString();});}export function isNullOrWhiteSpace(value){return!value||typeof value!=='string'||!trim(value);}export function trim(value){if(!value||typeof value!=='string'){return value;}if(value.trim){return value.trim();}return value.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');}export function startsWith(value,prefix){let ignoreCase=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:true;if(!value||!prefix){return false;}if(ignoreCase){value=value.toLocaleLowerCase();prefix=prefix.toLocaleLowerCase();}if(value.startsWith){return value.startsWith(prefix);}return value.indexOf(prefix)===0;}
